title: Charlize Theron bundles up in style as she faces the autumn air in furry tartan coat
text:
Charlize Theron was ready for the Big Apple's falling temperatures on Sunday as she was spotted donning a furry tartan coat on her way out of the SVA Theater.

The screen star looked slick in a black quarter-sleeve top and wide-leg white pants that she wore beneath her outerwear.

Theron, 44, paired the look with black pointed-toe boots and a gold pendant necklace.

Posh: Charlize Theron was ready for the Big Apple's falling temperatures on Sunday as she was spotted donning a furry tartan coat in green and black on her way out of the SVA Theater

She also wore small gold hoop earrings with a single diamond that dangled from them.

The blonde beauty is currently on a press blitz to promote her upcoming political drama Bombshell.

She will star in the film alongside Nicole Kidman, Margot Robbie, John Lithgow and Alison Janney among others.

Stylish: The blonde beauty is currently on a press blitz to promote her upcoming political drama Bombshell

Bombshell centers on a group of female employees at Fox News who take on a toxic male culture, leading to the downfall of media mogul Roger Ailes, according to an official synopsis.

Theron plays journalist Megyn Kelly in the film and underwent hours in the makeup chair to transform into her likeness.

The actress told Entertainment Tonight that the work done was so realistic that her Kidman, who stars as journalist Gretchen Carlson in the film, didn't recognize her in passing.

On-screen: She will star in the film alongside Nicole Kidman, Margot Robbie, John Lithgow and Alison Janney among others

'She walked by me at one point and I thought she was mad at me,' Theron recalled.

'I thought, "Oh god! What did I do? Did I mess something up in her trailer? Did I not say hi nicely?"'

'She just came up to me and she was like "Charlize?" and then I said, "Yes are you mad at me?"

'She said, "No I just didn't know that was you!"'

Bombshell hits theaters on Dec. 20, 2019.
